description_html: The Roulette Round Table features a pin wheel style base layout with slanted legs suggesting a rotating movement. Profiled legs and table edges add a softened tactile quality to the design. Available in round, square and rectangular tops in a wide range of sizes. Tops are offered in fixed and extension versions with one or two leaves. Standard finishes include 6 wood species in 31 standard finishes. Custom woods, finishes and sizes are available upon request. Shown in a 54" round with the solid wood top option in Cerused Silver Walnut.
